0.00.text:
Hello,
I'm Ellen from Blue Badge Company.

2.60.text:
We make attractive wallets
for your disabled parking permit.

6.92.text:
It all began when my friend, Camilla,
received her first Blue Badge

10.80.text:
and all she could find to put it in
was this!

15.04.text:
So she made herself one
out of red and white polka dot.

19.04.text:
I really liked it,
so I made one for my gran.

22.28.text:
Granny was really impressed
and showed it off to all her friends.

26.12.text:
As the requests for our Blue Badge
wallets started to flood in, we thought,

29.64.text:
"You know what?
We might be on to something here!"

33.00.text:
So we set up a website,
put our products up on Amazon

36.88.text:
and turned our back bedroom
into a tiny workroom.

40.00.text:
To be honest, we didn't take it seriously
to start with,

43.36.text:
but then Boots approached us
at a trade show.

46.08.text: The buyer's mum was a Blue Badge holder,

48.40.text: so she got the product like that and thought they were lovely.

51.32.text:
Now you'll find our wallets
in most Boots stores.

57.36.text:
I'm keeping true
to my northern textiles roots.

59.96.text:
You can take that girl out of Yorkshire,
but you best hadn't really!

63.48.text:
Because of the way we manufacture,
we can offer piecework,

67.04.text:
which means people get paid a fixed rate
for each unit they produce,

71.00.text: which they can choose to do from home.

73.24.text:
Therefore, we can offer jobs and training
for people with limited work options,

77.12.text:
like those with domestic responsibilities
or disabilities.

80.80.text:
Hi, I'm Jenny. I'm here at my kitchen
table gluing and sticking.

86.16.text:
I make the inner parts
of the Blue Badge wallet.

89.20.text:
I find it good to work from home,
as I'm my son's main carer

93.40.text:
and I can fit his care
and family life around work.

97.24.text: I've always liked to be active

99.32.text:
and knowing that I'm progressing
in some direction.

102.48.text: Blue Badge gave me the chance

104.60.text:
to be part of a dynamic team
and a developing company.

109.96.text:
There are over 2.5 million
Blue Badge holders in the UK

114.24.text:
and I bet you most of those use
their permits frequently, if not daily.

119.28.text: So why not have something nice to put it in -

122.00.text:
something that says more about style
than disability?

127.36.text: ♪ YES SIR BOSS: "Naked Inside My Head"
